fields.comment: How many units of material we currently store
fields.name: ingestion_size

fields.comment: How many units of material we can store
fields.name: ingestion_capacity

fields.comment: How many frames is ingestion_size retained after last time eating?
fields.name: ingestion_cooldown_delay_frames

fields.comment: One unit of ingestion_size is removed every N frame
fields.name: ingestion_reduce_every_n_frame

fields.comment: How much damage per overingested cell is applied
fields.name: overingestion_damage

fields.comment: affects healing speed if entity has HEALING_BLOOD game effect. The amount of hp restored per one blood cell.
fields.name: blood_healing_speed

fields.comment: If set, only materials with this tag will increase satiation level
fields.name: ingestion_satiation_material_tag

fields.comment: Next frame ingestion_size cooldown can occur
fields.name: m_ingestion_cooldown_frames
